unnormalised: **Energy & Utilities: Gas Cylinder Prices Pinching Pockets Again!**
normalised: **Energy and Utilities: Gas Cylinder Prices Pinching Pockets Again!**

unnormalised: Namaste, folks! That dreaded day of the month is here again - gas cylinder price update! And guess what? The cooking gas fairies haven't been kind.
normalised: Namaste, folks! That dreaded day of the month is here again - gas cylinder price update! And guess what? The cooking gas fairies haven't been kind.

unnormalised: Subsidized LPG cylinders in Delhi are now costing Rs. 50 more. That's hitting the aam aadmi right in the roti-making budget!
normalised: Subsidized L P G cylinders in Delhi are now costing rupee fifty more. That's hitting the aam aadmi right in the roti-making budget!

unnormalised: Industry sources whisper about rising crude oil prices internationally affecting things locally. Dr. Sharma from the Energy Institute of India stated, "Global instability directly impacts our domestic markets."
normalised: Industry sources whisper about rising crude oil prices internationally affecting things locally. Doctor Sharma from the Energy Institute of India stated, "Global instability directly impacts our domestic markets."

unnormalised: Meanwhile, many are switching to induction cooktops, even though it means rewiring their 500 sq ft apartments in Mumbai.
normalised: Meanwhile, many are switching to induction cooktops, even though it means rewiring their five hundred square feet apartments in Mumbai.

unnormalised: Forget fancy dinner parties; it's dal chawal nights for many middle-class families until the next price drop (if ever!).
normalised: Forget fancy dinner parties; it's dal chawal nights for many middle-class families until the next price drop (if ever!).

unnormalised: Heard aunty Sheela complaining at the sabzi mandi about how much extra she's spending. "Yeh toh loot hai!" she exclaimed.
normalised: Heard aunty Sheela complaining at the sabzi mandi about how much extra she's spending. "Yeh toh loot hai!" she exclaimed.

unnormalised: Guess it's time to brush up on those chulha-making skills, just in case! Stay tuned for more price updates.
normalised: Guess it's time to brush up on those chulha-making skills, just in case! Stay tuned for more price updates.
